issue.title: Removing CGP compliance
issue.body:
**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Catalogue Gateway Protocol (CGP) is an old feature encapsulated inside PROXY servlet for CATALOG transactions.
This protocol was used by the Swiss metadata network before CSW specifications.
With the new Geocat version, this protocol was still supported for backward compatibility with old Swiss catalogues before they move to CSW.

As far as I know, Swiss users of EasySDI CATALOG (Bern and Vaud) don't use any more such CGP protocol and we propose to remove this feature from the new PROXY version.

May I ask EasySDI Steering Committee to give back his advice and vote about removing such feature ?
+1 = remove CGP protocol from EasySDI v3 / no advice
-1 = keep CGP protocol inside EasySDI v3

Thanks a lot,
Bruno


**Fixed versions :** 4.0.0

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

+1

Indeed, this features is obsolete and can be removed from next PROXY version.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Hello Hélène,

Confirmation done about removing CGP feature from the new PROXY version.

Thanks,
